comment: I went for a conference stayed for few days. Hotel nice as per charges but location far from happening areas of kathmandu. The hotel staff was courteous but little but inexperienced.

We made a last-minute booking because the hotel we originally checked into was not as advertised. I was so so happy as soon as we walked in because it was winter time and the lobby was nicely heated up and they had a lift which is not something most buildings in Kathmandu have. Check-in was quick and smooth, we arrived early and were allowed to go to our rooms since it was available. The room was huge and came with a king-sized bed, very well furnished and had a great bathroom and a nice warm shower. It was ULTRA clean and looked almost as though we were the first ones to ever sleep in that room. They also have their own generator which is really helpful especially when Kathmandu could experience a couple of power shortages in 1 day. We had room service that evening and their penne was on point! Breakfast was also delicious and the hotel staff were always happy to go the extra mile and stop for a chat . Definitely a place I would highly recommend!

The hotel staff was helpful, from asking the restaurant for specially prepared ginger honey lemon tea, to helping me find over rhe counter medicine for cold...super helpful. The following day, the even provided a complimentary shuttle ti the airport although airport is just a walking distance away (easy for those with less load). Place is so clean and quiet! I'd recommend it to friends who are staying long in Kathmandu

Kathmandu Nomad Hotel is suitable hotel for foreigners. The location of Hotel center of Thamel, it's safe location and easy to access nearby attractions place and things to do. The owner of Hotel and staff are more friendly and they all able to speak English in well manner. The Nomad Hotel also have restaurant and the food really delicious and taste. The price also reasonable with the quality of food. Have a great trip to Kathamandu, Nepal

Our agency arrange our stay in Shankar Hotel in Kathmandu which was very wonderful stay, highly recommended!! The Shankar hotel is located in Lazimpat which is about 15 minute walk from center of downtown. All of our hotel reservation, city excursions, flight tickets and adventure activities are booked by Breakfree Adventures, an excellent tour company owned by group of local guides. This guys are highly recommended for your adventure travel to Nepal himalaya.
Staffs are very frÄ±endly and helpful
